r.d: ev provides interface to libev library - high performance full-featured event loop written in C.
r.n: Fixed #7: static building was not supported(Tim) Fixed #9: factory methods messed up the instance zval properties thus causing fatal errors in PHP 5.6 Fixed: EvWatcher::keepalive method didn't regard the default value of the 1st argument. Pulled latest fixes from libev's upstream
